Mr. Crenshaw raised a point of order against the Heck (WA) amendment (A028). Mr. Crenshaw stated the provisions of the Heck(WA) amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
By unanimous consent, the Heck (WA) amendment was withdrawn. (consideration: CR H4733)
